name: Lipila
description:
A small Prototype i made, suggestions, feedback good or bad is appreciated. This will get Updates based on feedback regulary, so expect things to change often.

PC:

How to Play: Shoot your grappling hook with the left mouse button, you can retract it by holding the button.

With the right mouse button you can disconnect the grapple.

You gain points based on your velocity.

Press Esc. to close the Game

Press R to restart in a different Level.

Android:

Touch the circle you want to grapple and continue to touch to retract.

Shake your phone to disconnect the grapple
